title: Augusto Palacios
text:
Augusto Palacios (born 23 December 1951) is a <a href="Peru">Peru</a>vian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former football player. He's been recently coaching <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>n club <a href="Orlando%20Pirates">Orlando Pirates</a> in the <a href="Premier%20Soccer%20League">Premier Soccer League</a>.
During his years as a professional footballer he played for a number of clubs in Peru, <a href="Costa%20Rica">Costa Rica</a>, <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a>, <a href="Venezuela">Venezuela</a>, <a href="Finland">Finland</a>, <a href="West-Germany">West-Germany</a>, South Africa and <a href="Australia">Australia</a>. He also played six internationals for <a href="Peru%20national%20football%20team">Peru</a>.
Augusto Palacios has previously managed clubs in South Africa, Peru and <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a> as well as the women's national team of <a href="Hong%20Kong%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Hong Kong</a> and the national team of <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20football%20team">South Africa</a>.
